content: **crochet rainbow decoration for christmas in drops paris theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no w-787 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** the piece measures approx width = 10 cm height = 5 cm **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 08 dark purple 50 g colour 09 royal blue 50 g colour 11 opal green 50 g colour 41 mustard 50 g colour 06 cerise 50 g colour 12 red 1 rainbow weighs approx 10 g **crochet gauge ** 20 double crochets in width and 22 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
